snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Dune Full Presentation | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2023
snippet.description:
Microsoft's ambitious Flight Simulator is introducing an iconic ship from the blockbuster sci-fi hit Dune. The presentation details how the MS Flight Sim team translated the sci-fi tech of the Dune aircraft into the grounded simulator. 

#dune #xbox #gaming
